name: Okabuds
description:
As I was picking cherries last summer, I had to sort the fruits from the leaves in my bucket everyday. Throw the leaves out, keep the cherries in. I figured it would make a fun game.

Okabuds is a frenetic sorting game. You have 1 minute to get a score as high as possible.

You simultaneously sort two lanes, one with each hand.

  • Left hand:
    • Press D to send token outside
    • Press F to send token inside
  • Right hand:
    • Press J to send token inside
    • Press K to send token outside

I took this game as an opportunity to learn more about shaders and sound design with Wwise. All music and sounds made by me.
